text: 17|5|Tara pichata e'i dutara prathamatora nirdharaita samaya yetiya upasthita ha’la tetiya ami tomalokara biraud'dhe yud'dhata atyanta saktisali amara bandasakalaka patha'ichilo, phalata te'omloke gharae gharae praraesa karai dhbansayajna cala'ichila. E'ito achila enekuraa pratisrauti yito karyakara ha’balagiya'i achila.
